definition: to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
to sit astride/to ride (a horse, bike etc)/classifier for saddle horses

sentences.english: His horse, Eastern Express, seemed ready to run and win the race.
sentences.chinese: 他的坐骑“东方快车”显得状态颇佳。

sentences.english: Knell beetles have also been known to be used as mounts by Underdark races.
sentences.chinese: 已经知道丧钟甲虫会被幽暗地域的种族用作坐骑。

sentences.english: Jarod yanked his mount aside just in time to avoid an agonizing death.
sentences.chinese: 迦洛德猛拉他坐骑跑到一边才免于痛苦的死去。

sentences.english: An optional nickel-plated input unit and foot mounts are available for right-angle drive applications.
sentences.chinese: 可选的镀镍输入装置和脚坐骑为直角传动应用提供。

sentences.english: Good way so you don't lose track of it and it will be always with you.
sentences.chinese: 这样就不会找不到座骑了，坐骑也总和你在一起。

sentences.english: I'm jumpin' in my ride, I'm heading out tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我在我的坐骑上雀跃，今夜我将启程。

sentences.english: Knell beetles were used as mounts by the warrior legions of the ancient Dhakaan Empire.
sentences.chinese: 丧钟甲虫被古代达卡安帝国的武士军团作为坐骑使用。

sentences.english: However, the horse rode by the lady of the Guo State is absolutely another sort of animal.
sentences.chinese: 而虢国夫人游春的坐骑，完全是另类牲口了。

sentences.english: Swind softly blowing to green-field and plain. People bright ride on animals without sad.
sentences.chinese: 和风轻柔绿茵平原，人们在坐骑上欢快地游玩。

sentences.english: I just hope to get the best from my horses and would love to win a race, " she said."
sentences.chinese: 希望我的坐骑均能交出最佳表现，并能为我胜出头马。

sentences.english: They dismounted the general by stealing his horse.
sentences.chinese: 他们盗走将军的马匹使他丧失坐骑。

sentences.english: "Kill" them by running onto the buzzards with your mount.
sentences.chinese: 用你的坐骑跳到他们身上杀了他们。

sentences.english: They wanted to make a saddle-horse of him at first.
sentences.chinese: 起初，有人想把它当成一匹坐骑。

sentences.english: Yes, many flying mounts are available, such as pegasus or griffins .
sentences.chinese: 有的，还有其他多种飞行坐骑，比如飞马和狮鹫。

sentences.english: It mounts inside a pipe or at the bottom of a rectangular, trapezoid or egg-shaped channel.
sentences.chinese: 它内部管道或在一个矩形，梯形或蛋型通道底部坐骑。

definition: person in charge of pack animals/chariot driver
to sit astride/to ride (a horse, bike etc)/classifier for saddle horses
